Food: The quality of the food was disappointing. The dishes lacked flavor and presentation was unappealing. The menu options were limited, and the ingredients didn't seem fresh or well-prepared. Overall, it failed to meet expectations in taste and quality.

Service: The staff appeared inattentive and unfriendly. It took a long time to get ordered drinks and food was served inconsistently. There was a lack of professionalism and responsiveness, making the dining experience frustrating and unwelcoming.

Atmosphere: The ambiance was dull and uninviting. The decor was outdated, and the noise levels made it difficult to have a comfortable conversation. Overall, the environment didn't contribute positively to the dining experience and felt neglected.
Amazing service definitely recommend good vibes
Great vibes inside & outside...food is fantastic, music sets the mood all the time & the energy makes it a great environment for wonderful night #WiseUp
